## My Journey

I am a rigorous biostatistician and epidemiologist with over 9 years of experience in health data analytics, statistical modeling, and large-scale data management. Certified in SAS Base Programming and Clinical Trials Programming, I am transitioning from academia to the pharmaceutical industry to apply my expertise in CDISC standards (SDTM/ADaM) and real-world evidence (RWE) to clinical research and regulatory submissions.

With a proven track record in international projects, I excel in collaborative environments, delivering submission-ready insights and supporting high-quality publications.

## Education

- **Master's in Public Health** - Aix Marseille University
- **PHD in Infectious Disease** - Aix Marseille University
- **SAS Certifications** - Base Programming and Clinical Trials Programming
- **Additional Training** - Introduction to the Principles and Practice of Clinical Research
- **Additional Training** - Infectious Disease Transmission Models for Decision-Makers & R
Programming
